report.title: EBMS App sites list report v2
report.description: Lists sites to be used in the App, with updated field list.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.int_value = #userID# AND lav.deleted=false JOIN location_attributes la ON la.caption = 'CMS User ID' AND la.id = lav.location_attribute_id AND la.deleted=false JOIN location_attribute_values lav2 ON lav2.location_id = l.id AND lav2.deleted=false JOIN location_attributes la2 ON la2.caption = 'No. of sections' AND la2.id = lav2.location_attribute_id AND la2.deleted=false #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND EXISTS (SELECT id FROM location_attributes_websites law WHERE law.website_id = #website_id# AND law.location_attribute_id = la.id AND law.deleted = FALSE) AND EXISTS (SELECT id FROM location_attributes_websites law2 WHERE law2.website_id = #website_id# AND law2.location_attribute_id = la2.id AND law2.deleted = FALSE) #filters# #order_by#

param.name: website_id
param.display: Website Id for the occurrence record

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
